text: Manfred Lahnstein (born 20 December 1937) is a German politician of the Social Democratic Party (SPD). In 1982 he was German Federal Minister of Finance as well as Federal Minister of Economics. Until 2004, he worked for the media conglomerate Bertelsmann. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Finance ministers of Germany Category:Politicians from North Rhine-Westphalia Category:Politicians of the Social Democratic Party of Germany Category:Economy ministers of Germany Category:Heads of the German Chancellery
title: Manfred Lahnstein
